problem_text_cn: 分别以n边形的顶点为圆心,以单位1为半径画圆,如图所示,则图中阴影部分的面积之和是多少个平方单位？()
problem_text_en: Take the vertex of the n-edged polygon as the center and draw the circle with the unit N_0 as the radius. As shown in the figure, how many square units is the sum of the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure? ()
raw_answer: 解:∵多边形的外角和为360°,∴S~A1~+S~A2~+...+S~An~=S~圆~=π×1²=π(平方单位)；故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题利用了多边形的外角和为360°和圆的面积公式求解．
